63 template<typename T, typename P = void>
64 class SmartPointer
65 {
66 public:
73  SmartPointer ();
74 
75  /*
76  * Copy constructor for
77  * SmartPointer. We do now
78  * copy the object subscribed to
79  * from <tt>tt</tt>, but subscribe
80  * ourselves to it again.
81  */
82  template <class Q>
83  SmartPointer (const SmartPointer<T,Q> &tt);
84 
85  /*
86  * Copy constructor for
87  * SmartPointer. We do now
88  * copy the object subscribed to
89  * from <tt>tt</tt>, but subscribe
90  * ourselves to it again.
91  */
92  SmartPointer (const SmartPointer<T,P> &tt);
93

258 
259 
260 template <typename T, typename P>
261 inline
262 SmartPointer<T,P>::SmartPointer ()
263  :
264  t (0), id(typeid(P).name())
265 {}
266 
267 
268 
269 template <typename T, typename P>
270 inline
271 SmartPointer<T,P>::SmartPointer (T *t)
272  :
273  t (t), id(typeid(P).name())
274 {
275  if (t != 0)
276  t->subscribe(id);
277 }
278 
279 
280 
281 template <typename T, typename P>
282 inline
283 SmartPointer<T,P>::SmartPointer (T *t, const char *id)
284  :
285  t (t), id(id)
286 {
287  if (t != 0)
288  t->subscribe(id);
289 }
290

292 
293 template <typename T, typename P>
294 template <class Q>
295 inline
296 SmartPointer<T,P>::SmartPointer (const SmartPointer<T,Q> &tt)
297  :
298  t (tt.t), id(tt.id)
299 {
300  if (t != 0)
301  t->subscribe(id);
302 }
303 
304 
305 
306 template <typename T, typename P>
307 inline
308 SmartPointer<T,P>::SmartPointer (const SmartPointer<T,P> &tt)
309  :
310  t (tt.t), id(tt.id)
311 {
312  if (t != 0)
313  t->subscribe(id);
314 }
315 
316 
317 
318 template <typename T, typename P>
319 inline
320 SmartPointer<T,P>::~SmartPointer ()
321 {
322  if (t != 0)
323  t->unsubscribe(id);
324 }
325 
326 
327 
328 template <typename T, typename P>
329 inline
330 void
331 SmartPointer<T,P>::clear ()
332 {
333  if (t != 0)
334  {
335  t->unsubscribe(id);
336  delete t;
337  t = 0;
338  }
339 }
340 
341 
342 
343 template <typename T, typename P>
344 inline
345 SmartPointer<T,P> &SmartPointer<T,P>::operator = (T *tt)
346 {
347  // optimize if no real action is
348  // requested
349  if (t == tt)
350  return *this;
351 
352  if (t != 0)
353  t->unsubscribe(id);
354  t = tt;
355  if (tt != 0)
356  tt->subscribe(id);
357  return *this;
358 }
359 
360 
361 
362 template <typename T, typename P>
363 template <class Q>
364 inline
365 SmartPointer<T,P> &
366 SmartPointer<T,P>::operator = (const SmartPointer<T,Q> &tt)
367 {
368  // if objects on the left and right
369  // hand side of the operator= are
370  // the same, then this is a no-op
371  if (&tt == this)
372  return *this;
373 
374  if (t != 0)
375  t->unsubscribe(id);
376  t = static_cast<T *>(tt);
377  if (tt != 0)
378  tt->subscribe(id);
379  return *this;
380 }
381 
382 
383 
384 template <typename T, typename P>
385 inline
386 SmartPointer<T,P> &
387 SmartPointer<T,P>::operator = (const SmartPointer<T,P> &tt)
388 {
389  // if objects on the left and right
390  // hand side of the operator= are
391  // the same, then this is a no-op
392  if (&tt == this)
393  return *this;
394 
395  if (t != 0)
396  t->unsubscribe(id);
397  t = static_cast<T *>(tt);
398  if (tt != 0)
399  tt->subscribe(id);
400  return *this;
401 }
402 
403 
404 
405 template <typename T, typename P>
406 inline
407 SmartPointer<T,P>::operator T *() const
408 {
409  return t;
410 }
411 
412 
413 
414 template <typename T, typename P>
415 inline
416 T &SmartPointer<T,P>::operator * () const
417 {
418  Assert(t != 0, ExcNotInitialized());
419  return *t;
420 }
421 
422 
423 
424 template <typename T, typename P>
425 inline
426 T *SmartPointer<T,P>::operator -> () const
427 {
428  Assert(t != 0, ExcNotInitialized());
429  return t;
430 }

434 template <typename T, typename P>
435 template <class Q>
436 inline
437 void SmartPointer<T,P>::swap (SmartPointer<T,Q> &tt)
438 {
439 #ifdef DEBUG
440  SmartPointer<T,P> aux(t,id);
441  *this = tt;
442  tt = aux;
443 #else
444  std::swap (t, tt.t);
445 #endif
446 }
447 
448 
449 
450 template <typename T, typename P>
451 inline
452 void SmartPointer<T,P>::swap (T *&tt)
453 {
454  if (t != 0)
455  t->unsubscribe (id);
456 
457  std::swap (t, tt);
458 
459  if (t != 0)
460  t->subscribe (id);
461 }
462 
463 
464 
465 template <typename T, typename P>
466 inline
467 std::size_t
468 SmartPointer<T,P>::memory_consumption () const
469 {
470  return sizeof(SmartPointer<T,P>);
471 }

482 inline
483 void swap (SmartPointer<T,P> &t1, SmartPointer<T,Q> &t2)
484 {
485  t1.swap (t2);
486 }

513 template <typename T, typename P>
514 inline
515 void swap (T *&t1, SmartPointer<T,P> &t2)
516 {
517  t2.swap (t1);
518 }
